column2: # load in traditional box score data

All elements of `...` must be named.
Did you want `dataTable = c(typeMeasure, isPlusMinus, isPaceAdjust, isRank, idPlayoffRound, 
    idMonth, idTeamOpponent, idPeriod, countLastNGames, namePlayer, 
    nameTeam, slugTeam, idPlayer, idTeam, gp, pctWins, fgm, fga, 
    pctFG, fg3m, fg3a, pctFG3, pctFT, gpRank, pctWinsRank, minutesRank, 
    fgmRank, fgaRank, pctFGRank, fg3mRank, fg3aRank, pctFG3Rank, 
    pctFTRank, fg2m, fg2a, pctFG2, agePlayer, wins, losses, minutes, 
    ftm, fta, oreb, dreb, treb, ast, tov, stl, blk, blka, pf, 
    pfd, pts, plusminus, fptsNBAActual, dd2, td3, winsRank, lossesRank, 
    rankFTM, rankFTA, orebRank, drebRank, trebRank, astRank, 
    tovRank, stlRank, blkRank, blkaRank, pfRank, pfdRank, ptsRank, 
    plusminusRank, fptsRank, dd2Rank, td3Rank)`?
